languages.text: "Если говорить просто — я ваш торговый представитель. Все приказы, сделки, официальные сообщения и встречи предварительно рассматриваются мной и передаются вам и от вас ниже по инстанции".

"To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."
languages.original_text: "Если говорить просто — я ваш торговый представитель. Все приказы, сделки, официальные сообщения и встречи предварительно рассматриваются мной и передаются вам и от вас ниже по инстанции".

traits.locale_text: "To put it simply, I'm your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "To put it simply, I'm your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “简单地说，我是您的贸易代表。所有法令、交易、官方通讯与议程都会先由我进行核查，之后再转交给您，由您颁布命令。”
languages.original_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: “简单地说，我是您的贸易代表。所有法令、交易、官方通讯与议程都会先由我进行核查，之后再转交给您，由您颁布命令。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Dicho de forma sencilla, soy su representante comercial. Cualquier decreto, trato, comunicado oficial o reunión pasa primero por mi supervisión antes de que se lo envíe a usted o, si viene de usted, lo envíe bajando por la jerarquía».
languages.original_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: «Dicho de forma sencilla, soy su representante comercial. Cualquier decreto, trato, comunicado oficial o reunión pasa primero por mi supervisión antes de que se lo envíe a usted o, si viene de usted, lo envíe bajando por la jerarquía».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「簡単に申しますと、私はあなたの貿易代理人です。あらゆる命令、取引、公式の連絡、会議などは先に私が目を通し、その後陛下に伝え、陛下から下の者たちへと通達することになります」
languages.original_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単に申しますと、私はあなたの貿易代理人です。あらゆる命令、取引、公式の連絡、会議などは先に私が目を通し、その後陛下に伝え、陛下から下の者たちへと通達することになります」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Einfach gesagt bin ich Eure Handelsvertreterin. Sämtliche Erlasse und Abkommen sowie die offizielle Kommunikation und alle Zusammentreffen werden zunächst von mir geprüft, dann an Euch weitergeleitet und gelangen schließlich von Euch wieder zurück in die Hierarchie."
languages.original_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: "Einfach gesagt bin ich Eure Handelsvertreterin. Sämtliche Erlasse und Abkommen sowie die offizielle Kommunikation und alle Zusammentreffen werden zunächst von mir geprüft, dann an Euch weitergeleitet und gelangen schließlich von Euch wieder zurück in die Hierarchie."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Pour faire simple, considérez-moi comme votre représentante commerciale. Tous les décrets, accords, communications officielles et demandes d'entrevues passent par moi, puis par vous, avant d'être transmis au reste de la hiérarchie. »
languages.original_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: « Pour faire simple, considérez-moi comme votre représentante commerciale. Tous les décrets, accords, communications officielles et demandes d'entrevues passent par moi, puis par vous, avant d'être transmis au reste de la hiérarchie. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Lafı uzatmadan ticaret temsilcinizim diyebilirim. Tüm fermanlar, anlaşmalar, resmî iletişimler ve toplantıları önce ben incelerim, ardından size iletirim. Sizden sonra da hiyerarşi doğrultusunda iletim devam eder."
languages.original_text: "To put it simply, I am your trade representative. Any and all decrees, deals, official communication, and meetings are first reviewed by me and then forwarded to you and from you down the hierarchy."

traits.locale_text: "Lafı uzatmadan ticaret temsilcinizim diyebilirim. Tüm fermanlar, anlaşmalar, resmî iletişimler ve toplantıları önce ben incelerim, ardından size iletirim; sizden sonra da hiyerarşi devam eder."
traits.speaker: Clemence
